Package edu.illinois.mitra.starl.comms

Classes enabling communication between robots.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MessageResult.ResultCallback  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    LossyMessageSender  
    MessageContents
    MessageContents is a container allowing multiple strings to be easily sent in a single message.
    MessageResult
    A MessageResult object is returned whenever a RobotMessage is added to the outgoing queue to track its progress.
    RobotMessage
    The RobotMessage class is used to pass messages between agents.
    SmartCommsHandler
    Implements the simple acknowledgment protocol (SAP) in an efficient manner.
    SmartUdpComThread
    Hardware specific implementation of SmartComThread.
    UdpGpsReceiver
    Hardware specific.
    UdpMessage
    UDPMessage is a wrapper for RobotMessage which includes additional information to track acknowledgments.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    UdpMessage.MessageState  

Package edu.illinois.mitra.starl.comms Description

Classes enabling communication between robots.
